Young mum, nurse killed in Waipapa, Far North crash named as Mandy Rita Simpson https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/young-mum-nurse-killed-in-waipapa-far-north-crash-named-as-mandy-rita-simpson/Q5FIN347ZVAETMQJST6WFOQLUY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/young-mum-nurse-killed-in-waipapa-far-north-crash-named-as-mandy-rita-simpson/Q5FIN347ZVAETMQJST6WFOQLUY/ Cherie HowieKilled hospital nurse “touched the lives of so many” - friendTue, 14 Jan 2025 03:57:28 +0000 The woman killed in a crash on State Highway 10 in Waipapa on December 28 last year has been named as Waipapa mum-of-3 Mandy Simpson. She's pictured with husband Mike Mackenzie. Photo / Givealittle

Train stopped after fleeing driver crashes on tracks near Levin https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/train-stopped-after-fleeing-driver-crashes-on-tracks-near-levin/RAMFRB5HKVH3TNFDPMR3YCPTHQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/train-stopped-after-fleeing-driver-crashes-on-tracks-near-levin/RAMFRB5HKVH3TNFDPMR3YCPTHQ/ A cordon is in place as police hunt for the occupants of the vehicle. Tue, 14 Jan 2025 03:02:41 +0000 A train was stopped and a section of railway temporarily closed this afternoon after a fleeing driver crashed and abandoned a vehicle on tracks near Levin this afternoon.
Gisborne’s Rugby Park has rich history featuring Maori All Black stars https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisbornes-rugby-park-has-rich-history-featuring-maori-all-black-stars/VB7NOAVHNVBDXEJFAJWBYMF2H4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisbornes-rugby-park-has-rich-history-featuring-maori-all-black-stars/VB7NOAVHNVBDXEJFAJWBYMF2H4/ Wynsley WrigleyHurricanes or Māori All Blacks games proposed for Gisborne's revamped Rugby Park. Tue, 14 Jan 2025 02:45:00 +0000 A view of the Rugby Park ground from the grandstand at the 2009 pre-season Super Rugby game between the Hurricanes and the Chiefs, which was enjoyed by a crowd of around 6000. Rugby Park is going through a significant redevelopment, including the grandstand, and it is hoped to mark the new-look facility with a match involving Super rugby teams or the Māori All Blacks. Photo / Paul Rickard
